item.title: 新兴市场债券与美国债券的联动性正在减弱
item.description: 由于新兴市场普遍出现强劲反弹，债券价格正日益独立于美国市场走势而自主波动。【原文：As a result of the sweeping rally across emerging markets, bonds prices are increasingly moving on their own accord, instead of in-line with the US.】

item.title: 匈牙利暂缓降息 因通胀数据引发疑虑
item.description: 匈牙利维持关键利率不变，因政策制定者正寻求启动货币宽松政策，同时等待通胀放缓趋势能否持续的证据。【原文：Hungary kept its key interest rate unchanged as policymakers looking to start monetary easing seek evidence that slowing inflation can be sustained.】

item.title: 美元跌至四年低点，美国风险加剧
item.description: 美元指数跌至近四年最低点，日元强势反弹为美元增添阻力。【原文：A gauge of the dollar slid to its weakest level in nearly four years as a resurgent yen adds to headwinds for the US currency.】

item.title: 冬季对美国电网的威胁日益加剧
item.description: 本周的暴风雨凸显了停电风险日益加剧。【原文：This week’s storm has highlighted the increasing risk of blackouts.】

item.title: 汇丰成为首家市值突破3000亿美元的欧洲银行
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司市值突破3000亿美元，成为首家实现这一成就的欧洲上市银行。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s market capitalization surpassed $300 billion, a first for a European-listed lender.】

item.title: 白银抛物线式上涨推动ETF交易量逼近标普500基金
item.description: 白银价格的暴涨正推动iShares白银信托交易所交易基金的交易量激增，该基金周一成交额接近400亿美元。【原文：Extreme gains in silver prices are driving massive volumes in the iShares Silver Trust exchange-traded fund, with almost $40 billion in turnover recorded on Monday.】

item.title: 从葡萄酒到汽车制造商：印度与欧盟巨额协议中的赢家与输家
item.description: 印度与欧盟达成一项期待已久的贸易协定，这不仅为印度出口商带来新的机遇，同时也重塑了本土制造商的竞争格局。【原文：India and the European Union concluded a long-awaited trade agreement, boosting prospects for Indian exporters while reshaping the competitive landscape for local manufacturers.】

item.title: 黑石集团以4亿美元溢价将马拉松石油出售给CVC资本
item.description: CVC资本合伙公司以12亿美元收购信贷投资机构马拉松资产管理公司，此举为黑石集团带来了意外之财。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc’s $1.2 billion acquisition of credit investor Marathon Asset Management has resulted in a windfall for Blackstone Inc.】

item.title: 加密货币"安全"收益交易在2022年爆雷后规模达60亿美元
item.description: 去年年底，加密货币平台Stream Finance在用户资金损失约9300万美元后崩盘，这暴露了数字资产领域一个常见的隐患：当市场转向时，所谓的"安全收益"承诺往往会土崩瓦解。【原文：When crypto platform Stream Finance collapsed late last year, after roughly $93 million in user funds were lost, it exposed a familiar fault line in digital assets: promises of “safe yield” tend to unravel when markets turn.】

item.title: 印度部长称俄罗斯石油进口量可能继续下降
item.description: 印度石油部长哈迪普·普里表示，作为全球第三大原油进口国，印度正积极拓展供应商渠道，预计其对俄罗斯原油的进口量将继续下降。【原文：India’s imports of Russian crude are expected to continue declining as the world’s third-largest buyer of the fuel diversifies suppliers, Oil Minister Hardeep Puri said.】

item.title: 土耳其出台新规限制银行，旨在打击离岸里拉市场
item.description: 土耳其当局正加大力度限制本土银行获取海外低成本资金，这是其遏制热钱从伦敦里拉市场撤出的行动之一。【原文：Turkish authorities are stepping up efforts to curb local banks’ access to cheaper funding abroad, part of their campaign to deter hot-money flows from the lira market in London.】

item.title: 南非拟修订并购规则以简化行政手续
item.description: 南非计划修改反垄断规则中关于并购申报的规定，此举可能为部分企业降低经营成本。【原文：South Africa plans changes to antitrust rules on reporting mergers that could ease the cost of doing business for some firms.】

item.title: 俄军空袭敖德萨 乌克兰能源系统遭多地袭击
item.description: 俄罗斯军队袭击了乌克兰南部港口城市敖德萨，这是俄军对能源基础设施发动的一系列打击行动的一部分。乌克兰总统泽连斯基称此举威胁到结束战争的外交努力。【原文：Russian forces hit the southern Ukrainian port city of Odesa as part of a wave of strikes on energy infrastructure that President Volodymyr Zelenskiy called a threat to diplomatic efforts to end the war.】

item.title: 万科在债务危机中争取时间，债券持有人接受延期偿付
item.description: 万科获得更多喘息空间，为其筹备中国史上最大规模的重组之一创造条件。此前，两只人民币债券的持有人接受了这家开发商推迟大部分偿付期限一年的方案。【原文：China Vanke Co. won more breathing room as it prepares what would be one of the country’s biggest-ever restructurings, after holders of two yuan bonds accepted the developer’s plan to delay the bulk of those payments by a year.】

item.title: 零杠杆单人对冲基金以65%回报率击败湾街
item.description: 刘福明在加油站和好市多超市隔壁的办公室里经营着自己的对冲基金，远离加拿大多数资金管理公司聚集的湾街。如今，他的基金已成为国内表现最优异的对冲基金之一。【原文：Francis Lau runs his hedge fund from an office next to a gas station and a Costco, far from Bay Street, where most of Canada’s money managers cluster. It has emerged as one of the best-performing hedge funds in the country.】

item.title: 巴西通胀率在2026年首次央行会议前小幅上升
item.description: 巴西1月初年度通胀率加速上升，凸显出价格压力持续存在，而央行官员们正聚集在一起，准备作出2026年的首次利率决定。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation accelerated in early January, underscoring lingering price pressures as central bankers gather for their first interest rate decision of 2026.】

item.title: 叛军入侵后，刚果黄金交易商瞄准30亿美元反弹
item.description: 随着2025年初金价的飙升，这一年正逐渐成为刚果民主共和国国有手工开采贵金属贸易商的关键转折点。【原文：As gold’s price surge intensified in early 2025, the year was shaping up to be a momentous one for the Democratic Republic of Congo’s state-owned trader of hand-dug precious metal.】

item.title: 黄金避险需求如何推动价格创下历史新高
item.description: 数个世纪以来，黄金始终是政治经济动荡时期最可靠的避险资产。作为一种价值稳定、便于携带且全球通用的商品，当万物动荡时，它总能带来安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 体育联盟努力吸引球迷远离非法直播
item.description: 随着越来越多的游戏、赛事和比赛被置于订阅付费墙后，粉丝们开始寻找替代方案。【原文：Fans look for workarounds as more games, matches and races go behind subscription paywalls.】

item.title: 特朗普将韩国纳入加征关税名单，最新威胁空洞无力
item.description: 彭博经济分析显示，特朗普仅在约四分之一的情况下兑现关税威胁。【原文：A Bloomberg Economics analysis shows Trump follows through on tariff threats only about a quarter of the time】

item.title: 特朗普在关税问题上约73%的时间选择退缩
item.description: 彭博经济研究的最新报告量化了美国总统兑现贸易威胁的频率。【原文：New research from Bloomberg Economics quantifies how often the US president follows through on his trade threats.】

item.title: 零售财富成为2400亿美元二级市场繁荣的黄金矿脉
item.description: 据杰富瑞金融集团报告显示，个人私募投资基金已成为规模达2400亿美元的二手私募股权市场中增长最快的资本来源。【原文：Private investment funds for individuals have become the fastest-growing source of capital in the $240 billion market for private secondhand stakes, according to a report from Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 英伟达缺乏明确继任者接替缔造公司的明星CEO
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋——硅谷任职时间最长的CEO——近日被问及如何在该职位上坚守三十余年。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang, the longest-serving chief executive officer in Silicon Valley, was recently asked how he’s managed to stay in the job more than three decades.】

item.title: 招聘公司SThree谨慎乐观：招聘低迷期已结束
item.description: 招聘公司SThree Plc表示，随着客户信心逐步回升，多个关键市场重回增长轨道，该公司正逐步走出长期招聘低迷的最艰难时期。【原文：Recruitment firm SThree Plc said it’s emerging from the worst of a prolonged hiring downturn, with client confidence slowly improving and several key markets returning to growth.】

item.title: 特斯拉目标股价持续攀升，盈利前景却急转直下
item.description: 华尔街对特斯拉公司释放出矛盾信号。分析师们对这家电动汽车制造商今年的盈利潜力日益持怀疑态度，但他们对该公司股价的预期却持续攀升。【原文：Wall Street is giving off mixed signals about Tesla Inc. Analysts are increasingly skeptical of the electric-vehicle maker’s earnings potential this year, but their expectations for the company’s stock price keep climbing.】

item.title: 比特币信徒正将目光投向股票和黄金
item.description:
随着黄金和股票的上涨，最初的加密货币较10月峰值下跌了约25%。

【原文：

The original cryptocurrency is down about 25% from its October peak as gold, stocks rally.

】

item.title: 高盛称全球经济增长推动市场风险偏好升至2021年以来最高水平
item.description: 高盛集团策略师指出，随着经济乐观情绪抵消地缘政治不确定性，投资者风险偏好已升至五年高位。【原文：Investor appetite for risk is the highest in five years as optimism about the economy counters geopolitical uncertainty, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 莫迪1000亿美元石油钻探计划旨在削减印度进口
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪周二表示，印度将石油钻探范围扩展至此前受限区域的举措，有望在本十年结束前吸引价值1000亿美元的投资。【原文：India’s efforts to expand oil drilling to previously restricted areas could help attract investments worth $100 billion by the end of the decade, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Tuesday.】

item.title: 国防产业将成为汽车业主导的捷克经济的支柱产业
item.description: 捷克共和国新政府将致力于将国防工业转型为国家出口经济的引擎，一位高级内阁成员表示，因为旗舰汽车行业正面临日益激烈的竞争。【原文：The Czech Republic’s new government will seek to transform the defense industry into an engine of the nation’s export economy as the flagship auto sector faces stiffening competition, a senior cabinet member said.】

item.title: 巴蒂斯塔的金融科技公司筹备巴西五年来的首次IPO
item.description: 巴西企业PicPay在过去五年间从简单的数字钱包转型为多元化金融科技公司，如今其战略转型即将面临投资者的公投。【原文：PicPay, the Brazilian firm that transformed itself from a simple digital wallet into a diversified fintech over the past five years, is about to face an investor referendum on that strategy shift.】
